definitions.definition: a region in an organ or tissue that has suffered damage through injury or disease, such as a wound, ulcer, abscess, tumor, etc.
examples: wound, injury, bruise, abrasion, contusion; Moreulcer, ulceration, sore, running sore, abscess; trauma "symptoms include clusters of red lesions"Moreulcer, ulceration, sore, running sore, abscess; trauma symptoms include clusters of red lesions
